pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.52: Sp.1.400: _Sāṭakapattoti lohapattasadiso susaṇṭhāno succhavi siniddho bhamaravaṇṇo mattikāpatto vuccati_, “_Sāṭakapatta_: what is meant is a clay bowl like an iron bowl, which is well-formed, has a nice and glossy surface, and has the color of a bee.” The color of a bee is black. [thig13.1:1.1](): _Kāḷakā bhamaravaṇṇasādisā_, “Black like the color of a bee.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.53: Sp.1.400: _Sumbhakapattoti pakatimattikāpatto. _, “_Sumbhakapatta_: an ordinary clay bowl.”
